summary: I'm a Technical Consultant with more than 16+ Years of Experience in Banking Product Development, Consulting, Implementation, and Support. As a presales technical consultant, I work on an individual role, mainly taking care of technical aspects on RFI/RFP, Technology and Architecture demo, and POC lead. I've played varied roles across the different teams as Solution/Integration Architect, Presales consultant, Developer, as well as the Team lead.

experience.description: I'm currently working as a Technical consultant @ Finacle Business Consulting Group
I worked as a Flexcube implementation engineer, primarily handling branch application design, development, and integration.
I worked as part of the Production Management Facilities and handled multiple support projects for the Deutsche Bank Investment Banking Operation.

projects.name: Finacle Retail Lending Implementation
projects.description:
Worked as an Integration Lead in Finacle Retail Lending Platform Implementation. Worked along with to define based Integration framework with Finacle, Designed End of Day Integration scheduler integration of Finacle with Bank scheduler, Provided framework for performing automated scenario testing tool. 
I helped bank team to bring up Finacle Integration with Retail Deposit Platform Implementation with a day to complete Finacle setup. For this whole activity, I got Finacle Cross Sell Award from Infosys.
